guides.title: Indoor Plant Care Basics
guides.shortDescription: Essential tips for indoor plant care
guides.fullDescription: Indoor plants need specific care to thrive. Maintain consistent watering schedules, ensure proper lighting, and monitor humidity levels. Most indoor plants prefer temperatures between 60-75°F (15-24°C). Regular pruning and cleaning of leaves help prevent pest problems.
guides.wateringSchedule: Weekly, when top soil is dry

guides.title: Succulent Care Guide
guides.fullDescription: Succulents are drought-resistant plants that store water in their leaves. They require well-draining soil and minimal watering. Place them in bright light and avoid overwatering, which is the most common cause of succulent problems. Allow soil to dry completely between waterings.

guides.title: Tropical Plants Care
guides.fullDescription: Tropical plants thrive in warm, humid environments. Maintain high humidity through misting or using a humidity tray. These plants typically need bright, indirect light and consistent moisture. Regular fertilization during growing season promotes healthy growth.
